concepts.name: Personal Data
concepts.definition: Any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person ('data subject').

concepts.name: Principles of Processing
concepts.definition: Fundamental rules that must be followed when processing personal data.

concepts.name: Explicit Consent
concepts.definition: Consent given by a clear affirmative act establishing a freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous indication of the data subject's agreement.

data_types.name: Biometric Data
data_types.definition: Personal data resulting from specific technical processing relating to the physical, physiological or behavioural characteristics of a natural person.

data_types.name: License Plate
data_types.definition: Vehicle registration plates which can be linked to a natural person.

rights.name: Right to Erasure
rights.description: The right to have personal data erased (Right to be forgotten).

rights.name: Right to Object
rights.description: The right to object to processing of personal data.

fines.description: Fines for violations of obligations of the controller and processor, certification body, monitoring body.
Fines for violations of basic principles for processing, including conditions for consent, data subjects' rights.
